description: Primes for which only two iterations of 'Prime plus its digit sum equals a prime' is possible.
links: Lars Blomberg, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: prime 727 -> 727 + (7+2+7) = prime 743 -> 743 + (7+4+3) = prime 757 -> next iteration yields composite 776.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1999.
